<!--Text-->
"The memory file used to share server information could not be opened. Most likely an indication that the server with the specified name isn't online."
<!--AutoGenerated/-->
### Description
_There is currently no further description available._
### Example
There is currently no code example available on how to reproduce error 3027. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to produce this error.

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // Foo can not be successfully invoked if PreFoo() is not
        // invoked previously. If Foo() is called like this, it will
        // generate an error 3027.
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```

### Resolution
There is currently no code example available on how to remedy error 3027. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to remedy this error.

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // We call PreFoo() prior to calling Foo(). Now, we will
        // no longer experience error 3027.
        Db.PreFoo();
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```
